gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 130, Hornets 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks defeated the Hornets, 130-104. Luka Doncic recorded 39 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists for the Mavericks, with Kyrie Irving adding 18 points, nine assists, and eight rebounds in the victory. Brandon Miller tallied 21 points, six rebounds, and four assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Mavericks have won four in a row and improve to 49-30, while the Hornets fall to 19-60.
